name: ASTRE
description:
Explore the galaxy in search of an energy source to sustain your home, Hyllios, as a Luminary Traveler.

Mysterious, energy species populate each luminary visited. 

ASTRE features:

  • Energy is life and ammo

  • Choice of approach

  • Ambiguous enemies

  • Fragmented level design

  • Lonely exploration of a foreign space fantasy universe
